The Trainer base shakes as the shells hit it. Ignatius scans the area
looking for the attacker. "Restart autoguns" he instructs.

10 Auto cannons raise up from the sand on all sides of the base fireing  two
shots each at the invading army. (about six at Incarcerator, four at
Starscream, and the other 10 at the Violator.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2001 3:59 PM
Subject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA


> LOL. That wasn't me playing along, Cyber, it was me forgetting about
> your plan. I would have played along anyways though :-).
>
> ::Killfest/Scyther/EndBringer/Incarcinator/Demise::
>
> Killfest felt all movement cease in his body, but the internal
> communication system that he shared with his team was still
> functional. He couldn't help in the battle, but he could communicate
> with them.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther flies out of the base, quickly heading for the fairly close
> Trainer base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBriner and Demise emerge from the base after Starscream flies out,
> and both head off to the Trainer base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Incarcinator arrives at the Trainer base, seeing the ships fighting
> each other and instead firing two of his very fast and explosive
> shells at the base's shields.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Ignatius sat back laughing, his next move didn't matter if he was
> tangled up
> > or not. "YOU KNOW WHAT TO DO." The computer hummed back to life
> acrivateing
> > a repulsor field around the base forceing the giant scorpion from
> it's hull
> > and resetting the variable shields. Not more than a second later
> the room
> > glowed yellow magnetizing the floor and containing the entire room
> with a
> > Stasis field making ANY movement from the intruders IMPOSSIBLE.
> >
> > Lets see here, I just caught Cygnar, Cyanide, Killfest,
> Halucinagen, The
> > Destrocons, Drillbit,
> >
> > I sent Yan a message yesterday with my plans (Thanks for playing
> along)
> > Making this perfectly legal. Besides if  the Violator can have all
> that
> > power then I can have a trap.
>
>
